The Yangtze River’s water and sediment discharges were obtained from the Yangtze Water Resources Committee (YWRC), Ministry of Water Resource of China. The data on wind speed and significant wave height at Sheshan Station (Fig. 1b) were downloaded from the European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts (ECMWF) ( http://www.ecmwf.int/). The global sea level data were downloaded from the sea level group of the Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organization (CSIRO), Australia’s national science agency ( http://www.cmar.csiro.au/); these data was updated from Church and White
48 . The mean coastal sea level data for China were derived from the State Oceanic Administration, People’s Republic of China ( http://www.soa.gov.cn/).
